page.title: 20RESEARCH TEAM
page.content: The researchers were pupils at {Rufford Comprehensive}and{St.Mary's {Church of England School,}Edwinstowe. Matthew Allsop,Richard Atkins,Kim Burbidge,Beverley Dear,Darryl Dilger Ingrid Fairholm,Mark Griffin,Rachel Green,Simon Guilfoyle,Sarah Hawkins, Mark Haynes,Elaine Jenkins,Mark Jephson,Lyndsey Nicol,David Morley, Alison Rose,Steven Munnings,Lisa Roxborough,Craig Webb, Julie Smith, Darren Wilkinson,Amanda Stretton, Samantha Taylor,Donna Williams, Jonathan Rodgers,Diane King,Lisa Marsden,Charlotte Snowden,John Paul Burton,Anne-Marie Boddy,and Paul Evans. The Head of St.Mary's Mr.M.J. Jackson retired onJuly 19th.1985. Other adults were Carol Ford, Victoria Walker and Philip Wilson.
